name: TAMAGROW
description:
Help to grow your dinosaur by accepting his ideas to tend him.
He might want to play ball, eat a hamburger or go into a rampage destroying buildings. Accept or reject the idea before it fades. The score is proportional to how much he grew in 100 seconds of game. Good luck!

A game made in less than 24 hours and (almost) alone for the Ludum Dare 34.

Thanks for Lambada Sueca for the game idea and Raf Mandwuff for the lovely dino.
